articles.description: Australia faces South Africa in the Women’s T20 World Cup at Dubai International Stadium, Dubai – follow text updates, radio commentary and video highlights.
articles.title: Australia vs South Africa LIVE: Women’s T20 World Cup – cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights and text updates

articles.description: England are staring at defeat following a terrible start to their run chase on the third evening of the second Test against Pakistan.
articles.title: Pakistan vs England: Tourists on course for defeat in Multan

articles.description: BBC Sport charts the background to a secretive process which saw Thomas Tuchel announced as the new England manager.
articles.title: Thomas Tuchel new England manager: How did we get here so quickly and quietly?

articles.description: India are bowled out for 46 by New Zealand on day two of the first Test in Bengaluru - the third-lowest score in their Test history.
articles.title: India vs New Zealand: Hosts bowled out for 46 in Bengaluru

articles.description: Sheffield United manager Chris Wilder says his players have found it difficult to deal with the death of former team-mate George Baldock
articles.title: Chris Wilder: George Baldock tragedy has been 'difficult' for Sheffield United

articles.description: Howard Webb says that VAR errors in the Premier League are significantly down from this time last season.
articles.title: VAR: Howard Webb says Premier League errors are down 80%

articles.description: Williams team principal James Vowles speaks to BBC Sport about their upturn in form, Franco Colapinto and why McLaren are an "inspiration".
articles.title: Williams team boss James Vowles on Colapinto, Sargeant and McLaren 'inspiration'

articles.description: Retiring Bangladesh all-rounder Shakib Al Hasan says he will be unable to his homeland because of "a security issue", meaning he will miss out on a final Test series.
articles.title: Shakib Al Hasan: Bangladesh cricketer to miss South Africa series over security concerns

articles.description: England lock Nick Isiekwe says he is in peak condition after recovering from a serious heart condition which could have ended his career.
articles.title: How Nick Isiekwe fought back to the England squad after heart operation

articles.description: BBC Sport and Opta have run through the numbers. Who is the Premier League's fastest player? Who covers the most distance? And which player has walked the furthest?
articles.title: Premier League stats: Who is fastest and who's walked the most this season?
